@Awaqward

Hi there, How far do you get in the installation? If you could give me some sort of clue then I may be able to help you bro.
I start it up after mounting it with DAEMON Tools, and there is a "Install Windows XP" button, but it's kind of shaded. And it has no effect when i click it.

Also it may be that you are trying to do an UPGRADE, say you have Vista or 7.
You can only upgrade if you have windows 200 or lower. either way you are best of installing via booting.
I'm trying to add Windows XP to my computer which only have Windows 7. :/

IN that case then you will have to do a dual boot, with 2 operating systems, I'm afraid I cannot help you with this since I only have rather basic knowledge and don't know how to get 2 operating systems on one PC.

awaqward,..2 OS is a bit complex..to simply do it you must first install XP by booting from CD,you have to back your data from current window...after XP is installed its easy to install window 7 on another partition.even from mounted on daemon...I tried it so I hope it can help you..goodkuck
